attributes.action: For tattoos and piercings to be accepted in a formal working environment.
attributes.additional_details: It is a freedom of expression and art. As long as it’s not inappropriate how is it any different to wearing a floral dress versus a spotty one. It does not in anyway affect professional. It’s the 21st century and it’s extremely common. It should not be a factor that can affect job dismissal.
attributes.background: For tattoos to be accepted and allowed in a work environment as long as they do not contain inappropriate or explicit content. E.g. teachers being able to have a floral tattoo on show. Many people in professional jobs can still be fired due to this. When it is common in society and is an art form
